name: Argon Assault (MaximusBlake)
description:
Argon Assault

space to shoot

wasd to move

Main Objective learn about timelines.

This is a rail shooter about a swarm of spaceships attacking a base in an unidentified area.  The main player plays as a small yellow ship trying to survive  during the attack.

I learned a lot about Unity during this project. I learned how to use time and audio/visual effects to make my games much more interesting. 

Instead of using the terrible picture they use in the videos, I decided to make a generic pilot.
